athenaPrompt: Want strategic thinking that scales without us?

body.text: Everyone knows thinking doesn't scale. Most companies accept it. We solved it. Turned our methodology into infrastructure so your team can use it without us.
Strategic frameworks for market decisions. Question patterns for product challenges. Mental models for operational problems. Code that works with you.
Access to 25+ live products. More launching monthly. 30-day trial.
